long_description: Ideal for backpacking in buggy places, the Outdoor Research BugOut Gaiters(TM) keep insects and trail debris out of your footwear. EPA-registered Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel helps repel mosquitoes, ticks and other biting insects. Insect Shield repellent treatment is effective through 70 washings. Breathable uncoated nylon packcloth provides lightweight durability. Easy-access, 1-in.-wide rip-and-stick closure opens in front for quick on/off; rip-and-stick tabs at the top and bottom create a secure closure that won't open while in use. Outdoor Research BugOut Gaiters are finished with a reinforced bootlace hook and a Hypalon(TM) instep strap. Average weight per pair is 4.4 oz.
short_description: Ideal for backpacking in buggy places, the Outdoor Research BugOut Gaiters(TM) keep insects and trail debris out of your footwear.
